name: teikei
description: Teikei root monorepo. Teikei is the software that powers ernte-teilen.org, a website that maps out Community-supported Agriculture in Germany.
author: Simon Jockers, Daniel Mack, Tobias Preu√ü, Christian Rijke

scripts.build: yarn install && npx lerna run build
scripts.dev: yarn setup && yarn install && run-p dev-api dev-map dev-schemas dev-migrations
scripts.clean: npx lerna clean --yes && npx lerna exec -- rm -rf build && npx lerna exec -- rm -rf lib

hooks.pre-push: cd admin && yarn lint && cd ../api && yarn lint && cd ../map && yarn lint && cd ../migrations && yarn lint
